items.sentence: Tom has a souvenir magnet of Boston on his fridge.
Tom has a very close relationship with his mother.
Tom has already bought everything he needs to buy.
I wonder why people always want to know the truth.
Instead of going to Boston, I\'m going to Chicago.
I am supposed to meet her at three this afternoon.
Let\'s just forget that this whole thing happened.
Let\'s make sure everything is where it should be.
Let\'s stay calm and think this through carefully.
I\'m not as busy now as I was this time last year.
